name: fuzzy-tab-switcher
description: Fast fuzzy search across all open tabs
author: Ruslan Gonzalez <ruslanguns@gmail.com>

scripts.build:chrome: TARGET=chrome vite build && node scripts/build-manifest.js chrome
scripts.build:firefox: TARGET=firefox vite build && node scripts/build-manifest.js firefox
scripts.build:safari: TARGET=safari vite build && node scripts/build-manifest.js safari
scripts.package:chrome: npm run build:chrome && node scripts/package.js chrome
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build:firefox && node scripts/package.js firefox
scripts.package:safari: npm run build:safari && node scripts/package.js safari
scripts.release: npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox && npm run package:safari
